TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ControlCollection implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 Office 解决方案中 Excel 工作表中的托管控件的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of managed controls on an Excel worksheet in an Office solution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用接口的方法和属性可以管理 Excel 工作表上的控件。Use the methods and properties of the interface to manage controls on an Excel worksheet. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time)。For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time). 无法在代码中创建此接口的实例, 因为它没有任何公共构造函数。You cannot create an instance of this interface in your code, because it does not have any public constructors. 若要在文档级项目中获取此接口的实例, 请使用项目中*n*类的属性之一。 `Sheet`To get an instance of this interface in a document-level project, use the property of one of the `Sheet`*n* classes in your project. 若要在文档级项目中获取此接口的实例, 请使用在运行时以编程方式创建的主机项的属性。To get an instance of this interface in a document-level project, use the property of a host item that you create programmatically at run time. 有关更多信息，请参见 [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time). 下表显示了如何使用成员执行一些与文档上的控件相关的常见任务。The following table shows how to use members to perform some common tasks related to controls on documents. |任务Task|操作Action| |----------|------------| |向工作表添加控件。Add a control to the worksheet.|使用 "添加*\<控件" >* 方法之一。Use one of the Add*\* methods. 例如, 若要添加, 请使用方法。For example, to add a , use the method.| |从工作表中删除控件。Remove a control from the worksheet.|使用 方法。Use the method.| |确定控件是否在集合中。Determine whether a control is in the collection.|将控件或其名称传递给方法。Pass the control or its name to the method.| |获取集合中的控件的索引。Get the index of a control in the collection.|将控件或其名称传递给方法。Pass the control or its name to the method.| |从集合中获取一个控件。Get a control from the collection.|向属性传递控件的索引或名称。Pass the index or name of the control to the property.| [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使你能够将控件添加到的末尾。 The method enables you to add controls to the end of the . 若要删除以前以编程方式添加的控件, 请使用方法。To remove a control that was previously added programmatically, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将数字16插入单元格**E1**到**E3** , 并将数字24向单元格**F1**到**F3**。The following code example inserts the number 16 to cells **E1** through **E3** and the number 24 to cells **F1** through **F3**. 然后, 该代码创建一个控件到单元格**A1**到**C8** , 并通过**F3**将单元格**E1**传递到方法, 以使用数据填充图表。The code then creates a control to cells **A1** through **C8** and passes cells **E1** through **F3** to the method to populate the chart with data. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelControlCollection#58](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelControlCollection/CS/Sheet1.cs#58)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelControlCollection#58](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelControlCollection/VB/Sheet1.vb#58)]

span.span: Multi-area ranges cannot be used.

exception.span: 该范围应与 实例同在一个工作表中。

span.span: The range should be on the same worksheet as the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使你能够将控件添加到的末尾。 The method enables you to add controls to the end of the . 若要删除以前以编程方式添加的控件, 请使用方法。To remove a control that was previously added programmatically, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将数字16插入单元格**E1**到**E3** , 并将数字24向单元格**F1**到**F3**。The following code example inserts the number 16 to cells **E1** through **E3** and the number 24 to cells **F1** through **F3**. 然后, 该代码将在工作表的顶部创建一个控件, 并通过**F3**将单元格 **E1**传递到该方法, 以填充包含数据的图表。The code then creates a control to the top of the worksheet and passes cells **E1** through **F3** to the method to populate the chart with data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于在运行时向添加任何控件。This method can be used to add any control to the at run time. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time)。For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用`AddControl`方法将两个自定义用户控件添加到工作表中。The following code example adds two custom user controls to the worksheet using the `AddControl` method. 第一个控件添加到单元格区域。The first control is added to a range of cells. 将第二个控件添加到特定位置。The second control is added to a specific location. 此代码会更改第一个自定义用户控件的属性, 这只会将控件移动到工作表中包含该控件的。The code changes the property of the first custom user control, which only moves the control relative to the that contains the control on the worksheet. 然后, 该代码设置第二个用户控件返回的的属性, 以说明设置控件的属性的正确方法。The code then sets the property of the returned by the second user control to illustrate the correct way to set the property of the control. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelControlCollection#10](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelControlCollection/CS/Sheet1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelControlCollection#10](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelControlCollection/VB/Sheet1.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应在代码中直接调用此方法。You should not call this method directly from your code. 请改为调用扩展方法以获取 Visual Studio。 Instead, call the extension method to obtain a Visual Studio . 扩展方法使用此方法生成与本机的实例相对应的 Visual Studio 。 The extension method uses this method to generate a Visual Studio that corresponds to an instance of a native . 扩展方法仅创建一次扩展。 The extension method creates an extended only once. 它在后续调用中返回现有扩展对象的相同实例。It returns the same instance of the existing extended object in subsequent calls. 相反, 每次都会创建一个新的扩展。In contrast, creates a new extended each time.

summary.span: 搜索具有指定名称的控件在 实例中的第一个匹配项。

returns.span: 一个表示控件索引的整数，如果控件不在 实例中，则为 -1。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于以编程方式添加的控件, `name`参数应包含指定为添加`Name` *\<控件 >* 方法的最后一个参数的名称, 而不是控件的属性。For controls that you add programmatically, the `name` parameter should contain the name that you specify as the last parameter of the Add*\* method, not the `Name` property of the control. 对于在设计时添加的控件, 该`name`参数应包含标识符。For controls that you add at design time, the `name` parameter should contain the identifier.

param.span: 要从 实例中移除的控件。

span.span: The control to be removed from the instance.

summary.span: 从 实例中移除指定的控件。

span.span: Removes the specified control from the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计时添加的控件无法从实例中移除。Controls that are added at design time cannot be removed from the instance. 只能使用方法删除在运行时添加的控件。You can only use the method to remove controls added at run time.
